commits.author: Chris M. Hostetter
commits.sourceNew:
public void inform(final SolrCore core) {
    
    final IndexSchema schema = core.getSchema();

    selector = 
      FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.createFieldNameSelector
      (core.getResourceLoader(),
       core.getSchema(),
       inclusions.fieldName,
       inclusions.typeName,
       inclusions.typeClass,
       inclusions.fieldRegex,
       getDefaultSelector(core));

    for (SelectorParams exc : exclusions) {
      selector = FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.wrap
        (selector,
         FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.createFieldNameSelector
         (core.getResourceLoader(),
          core.getSchema(),
          exc.fieldName,
          exc.typeName,
          exc.typeClass,
          exc.fieldRegex,
          FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.SELECT_NO_FIELDS));
    }
  }

commits.author: Steven Rowe
commits.sourceNew:
@Override
  public void inform(final SolrCore core) {
    
    selector = 
      FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.createFieldNameSelector
      (core.getResourceLoader(),
       core,
       inclusions.fieldName,
       inclusions.typeName,
       inclusions.typeClass,
       inclusions.fieldRegex,
       getDefaultSelector(core));

    for (SelectorParams exc : exclusions) {
      selector = FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.wrap
        (selector,
         FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.createFieldNameSelector
         (core.getResourceLoader(),
          core,
          exc.fieldName,
          exc.typeName,
          exc.typeClass,
          exc.fieldRegex,
          FieldMutatingUpdateProcessor.SELECT_NO_FIELDS));
    }
  }
